alert.note: Alert for Clay; Craighead; Greene; Mississippi (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Greene, northern Craighead, northwestern Mississippi, southeastern Clay and Dunklin Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 345 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rector to near Cardwell to near Lake Frierson State Park. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Paragould, Kennett, Piggott, Gosnell, Manila, Bono, Lake City, Leachville, Rector, Senath, Brookland, Monette, Caraway, Marmaduke, Crowleys Ridge State Park, Lake Frierson State Park, Oak Grove Heights, Cardwell and Hornersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
